features: With a pipette made of natural rubber
description:
This liquid Vitamin A is based on high-quality olive oil and rosemary extract. Retinol is a fat-soluble vitamin.

Production is based on HACCP guidelines, which means the product does not contain any genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate or other harmful substances.

Recommended use:


	Take 3 drops daily. Simply drip on the tongue or add to a dish.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children and young people.

features: 800 mcg of retinyl acetate per capsule
description:
Vitamin A (retinol) belongs to the fat-soluble vitamin group. In the form of retinyl acetate, it is rapidly metabolized by the body and is changed into retinol.

Recommended use:


	take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

Zeinpharma Vitamin A 10,000 I.U. contains vitamin A as retinyl acetate and supplies the optimal daily dosage of the vitamin. With 3.45 mg retinyl acetate in each capsule, your daily requirements are met with just one capsule.

Recommended dose:
Swallow 1 capsule daily with plenty of water with a meal. Do not chew.

Bioperine ™ is a black pepper extract.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

The ingredients in the NN ProVitamin A capsules include ingredients that are simply more successful together. The ingredients are much more efficient when they are combined than any of them would be on their own. The capsules include vitamin A and Dunaliela Salina.

Recommended use: 


	Take 2 capsules daily with meals and lots of water.

features: Contains vitamin B in activated form
Also ideal for vegan & vegetarian diets
description:
B vitamins belong to the group of water-soluble vitamins, are poorly stored in the organism and should therefore be taken regularly as a supplement.


	For vegetarians and vegans, a sufficient supply of vitamin B12 is particularly difficult: the vitamin can only be taken in through the diet, but is only found in animal products.
	In this case, it is particularly advisable to resort to the support of food supplements.
	B-Complex Plus by Pure Encapsulations® is vegan, ideally dosed in capsules and contains B vitamins in their activated form!


Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
Vitamin complex with all 8 B vitamins


	The 8 B vitamins B1 (thiamine), B2 (riboflavin), B6 (pyridoxine), B12 (cobalamin), biotin, folic acid (folate), niacin and pantothenic acid are combined under the term "B-complex" and complement each other in their functions.


Recommended intake:
Take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

Advice:


	B vitamins in adjusted dosage - ideal for long-term use.
	Suitable for children from the age of 12 if there is a supplementary need.

Activated coenzyme form:

Pyridoxal-5-Phosphate (P5P) is an already activated form of vitamin B6 and also occurs in this form in nature. The water-soluble B vitamin is involved in over 100 enzymatic reactions, especially in amino acid and protein metabolism.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

	Take 2 capsules daily with sufficient liquid.

	Vegetarian, hypoallergenic, free of yeast, wheat, soy and milk.

	Take 1 tablet daily.

Vitamin B12


	Important for energy metabolism
	Contributes to psychological well-being

	Vitamin B12 contributes to normal red blood cell formation
	Vitamin B12 contributes to a normal function of the immune system and contributes to reducing tiredness and fatigue
	Vitamin B12 has a role in cell division


Recommended use:


	take 1 capsule daily with a meal.

features: With a pipette made of natural rubber
description:
Vitamin B12 is primarily known for the fact that it is mainly only found in sufficient quantities in animal foods. Therefore, this vegan supplement, consisting of the two forms of vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin & adenosylcobalamin, is ideal for vegetarians and vegans.


	Made using HACCP guidelines, the product does not contain any genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate or other harmful substances.


Recommeneded use:


	Take 5 drops daily.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children and young people.

German packaging: Vitamin B Komplex

The activated vitamin B forms as contained in the Natural Love Vitamin B complex can only be found in a few other products.

The capsules include:


	Bio-active vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin (in a 2: 1 ratio)
	Folic acid as 5MTHF glucosamine folate
	Vitamin B7 as D-biotin


Recommended use:


	Take one capsule a day with plenty of fluids.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
A special feature of the Nature Love Vitamin B12 tablets is the 2:1 ratio of the two active vitamin B12 forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin. Furthermore, the formulation also contains folic acid (vitamin B9) in the stable form 5-MTHF glucosamine (Quatrefolic® from Gnosis).

Recommended use:


	Swallow 1 tablet every other day with plenty of liquid.
	One pack contains a 6 month supply of the product if taken as recommended.


Note:


	Not suitable for those who are under 18 years of age, pregnant or breastfeeding.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

productTitle: Vitamin B Complex Capsules Forte, 90 capsules
description:
The Vitamin B Complex capsules by ZeinPharma® combine the high-quality vitamins B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B12, folic acid and biotin in an optimal dose.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with a main meal with still water (at least 200 ml). Do not chew.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: No Synthetic Additives,     Made WITHOUT Animal Testing,     Vegan

description:
Looking for a product that contains vitamin B3 and vitamins B5, B6, B1, B2 and NADH? Then the Active-B Complex by Vitaplex is just the thing for you.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

The biotin tablets combine highly-dosed vitamin B7 with the trace elements zinc and selenium, and do not contain magnesium stearate, a release agent. The tablets can easily be divided or ground into powder to make them easier to take.


	Coating-free tablets
	High bioavailability
	No unnecessary additives


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with sufficient water


Please note:


	Store in a cool, dry place.
	Not suitable for children and adolescents.
	Consult a doctor before use if you're pregnant or breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of choking if you have trouble swallowing or take the tablets without enough liquid.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye,     FREE FROM Magnesium Stearate

description:
Highly dosed vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) in tablet form


	Vegetarian, hypoallergenic, and free from yeast, wheat, soy and milk


Recommended use :


	Take 1 tablet daily.

Vitamin B12 is found predominantly in animal-based foods. Therefore, it can be difficult for vegans and vegetarians to take in. 

This highly-dosed Vitamin B12 1000 µg supplement is made with a high-quality, bioactive micronutrient from methylcobalamin that the body can use immediately. It does not contain magnesium stearate or any other additives. 

Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with sufficient water.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children or adolescents.
	Consult your doctor before use if you're pregnant or nursing.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye

description:
Riboflavin (vitamin B2), which belongs to the B-group of vitamins, occurs in the human body as a coenzyme in two active forms, namely as flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD) and flavin mononucleotide (FMN), which is also called riboflavin-5-phosphate. With the cooperation of these coenzymes, the B vitamins folic acid and vitamin B6, among others, are converted into their active forms.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

Niacin contributes to:

About Niacin:


	Niacin stimulates the circulation and can trigger temporary, harmless skin redness (flushing).
	These symptoms usually disappear after a few days of use. As an alternative, niacinamide, which does not cause flushing, is recommended.
	8 water-soluble vitamins are contained by this vitamin B complex.
	These have an important function in the nervous system and are involved in the release of energy.
	In case of hypersensitivity, the niacinamide is recommended.


Recommended use:


	take 1 tablet daily


Please note:


	When taking products containing nicotinic acid, you may experience a harmless side effect called a "niacin flush" that expands your blood vessels. This means that for about 10 minutes you could experience reddened skin with an itchy feeling, as well as light, harmless swelling.

features: Made without release agent magnesium stearate

Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or young people.
	During pregnancy and breastfeeding, you should generally consult a doctor before consuming food supplements.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who have insufficient fluid intake.

attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

features: Is particularly well absorbed by the body
description:
Vitamin B complex from quinoa in a capsule form


	Quinoa seedlings are grown with vitamin B complex enriched water, soaking up the valuable nutrients into their plant structure.
	This results in a plant-based vitamin B source that is tasty and particularly easily absorbed by the body.
	The ground quinoa seedlings are ground and encapsulated as a natural food supplement.
	The contents of the capsule can also be stirred into yogurt or sprinkled onto a salad to reliably cover your daily requirement of the entire vitamin B spectrum.
	The vitamin B complex made from quinoa covers an increased requirement (120%) with two capsules and offers a complete supply of all eight B vitamins.
	Country of origin: Austria


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule with liquid twice a day
	Also suitable for pregnant and nursing women
	Store cool and dry, do not store above room temperature

	take 1 capsule daily with a meal.

features: With a pipette made of natural rubber
description:
Vitamin B12 is primarily known for the fact that it is mainly only found in sufficient quantities in animal foods. Therefore, this vegan supplement, consisting of the two forms of vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin & adenosylcobalamin, is ideal for vegetarians and vegans.


	Made using HACCP guidelines, the product does not contain any genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate or other harmful substances.


Recommeneded use:


	Take 5 drops daily.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children and young people.

German packaging: Vitamin B Komplex

The activated vitamin B forms as contained in the Natural Love Vitamin B complex can only be found in a few other products.

The capsules include:


	Bio-active vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin (in a 2: 1 ratio)
	Folic acid as 5MTHF glucosamine folate
	Vitamin B7 as D-biotin


Recommended use:


	Take one capsule a day with plenty of fluids.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
A special feature of the Nature Love Vitamin B12 tablets is the 2:1 ratio of the two active vitamin B12 forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin. Furthermore, the formulation also contains folic acid (vitamin B9) in the stable form 5-MTHF glucosamine (Quatrefolic® from Gnosis).

Recommended use:


	Swallow 1 tablet every other day with plenty of liquid.
	One pack contains a 6 month supply of the product if taken as recommended.


Note:


	Not suitable for those who are under 18 years of age, pregnant or breastfeeding.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:

	Coating-free tablets
	High bioavailability
	No unnecessary additives


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with sufficient water

	Store in a cool, dry place.
	Not suitable for children and adolescents.
	Consult a doctor before use if you're pregnant or breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of choking if you have trouble swallowing or take the tablets without enough liquid.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye,     FREE FROM Magnesium Stearate

description:
Highly dosed vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) in tablet form


	Vegetarian, hypoallergenic, and free from yeast, wheat, soy and milk


Recommended use :


	Take 1 tablet daily.

Vitamin B12 is found predominantly in animal-based foods. Therefore, it can be difficult for vegans and vegetarians to take in. 

This highly-dosed Vitamin B12 1000 µg supplement is made with a high-quality, bioactive micronutrient from methylcobalamin that the body can use immediately. It does not contain magnesium stearate or any other additives. 

Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with sufficient water.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children or adolescents.
	Consult your doctor before use if you're pregnant or nursing.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye

description:
Riboflavin (vitamin B2), which belongs to the B-group of vitamins, occurs in the human body as a coenzyme in two active forms, namely as flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD) and flavin mononucleotide (FMN), which is also called riboflavin-5-phosphate. With the cooperation of these coenzymes, the B vitamins folic acid and vitamin B6, among others, are converted into their active forms.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

Niacin contributes to:

About Niacin:


	Niacin stimulates the circulation and can trigger temporary, harmless skin redness (flushing).
	These symptoms usually disappear after a few days of use. As an alternative, niacinamide, which does not cause flushing, is recommended.
	8 water-soluble vitamins are contained by this vitamin B complex.
	These have an important function in the nervous system and are involved in the release of energy.
	In case of hypersensitivity, the niacinamide is recommended.


Recommended use:


	take 1 tablet daily


Please note:


	When taking products containing nicotinic acid, you may experience a harmless side effect called a "niacin flush" that expands your blood vessels. This means that for about 10 minutes you could experience reddened skin with an itchy feeling, as well as light, harmless swelling.

features: Made without release agent magnesium stearate
description:
This vitamin contains all 8 B vitamins in ideal ratios. Production takes place according to the highest quality standards and is suitable for vegetarians and vegans. In addition, the tablets are made without the release agent magnesium stearate.

Recommended use: 


	Take 1 tablet daily with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or young people.
	During pregnancy and breastfeeding, you should generally consult a doctor before consuming food supplements.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who have insufficient fluid intake.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

features: Is particularly well absorbed by the body
description:
Vitamin B complex from quinoa in a capsule form


	Quinoa seedlings are grown with vitamin B complex enriched water, soaking up the valuable nutrients into their plant structure.
	This results in a plant-based vitamin B source that is tasty and particularly easily absorbed by the body.
	The ground quinoa seedlings are ground and encapsulated as a natural food supplement.
	The contents of the capsule can also be stirred into yogurt or sprinkled onto a salad to reliably cover your daily requirement of the entire vitamin B spectrum.
	The vitamin B complex made from quinoa covers an increased requirement (120%) with two capsules and offers a complete supply of all eight B vitamins.
	Country of origin: Austria


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule with liquid twice a day
	Also suitable for pregnant and nursing women
	Store cool and dry, do not store above room temperature

features: Contains vitamin B in activated form
Also ideal for vegan & vegetarian diets
description:
B vitamins belong to the group of water-soluble vitamins, are poorly stored in the organism and should therefore be taken regularly as a supplement.


	For vegetarians and vegans, a sufficient supply of vitamin B12 is particularly difficult: the vitamin can only be taken in through the diet, but is only found in animal products.
	In this case, it is particularly advisable to resort to the support of food supplements.
	B-Complex Plus by Pure Encapsulations® is vegan, ideally dosed in capsules and contains B vitamins in their activated form!


Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
Vitamin complex with all 8 B vitamins


	The 8 B vitamins B1 (thiamine), B2 (riboflavin), B6 (pyridoxine), B12 (cobalamin), biotin, folic acid (folate), niacin and pantothenic acid are combined under the term "B-complex" and complement each other in their functions.


Recommended intake:
Take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

Advice:


	B vitamins in adjusted dosage - ideal for long-term use.
	Suitable for children from the age of 12 if there is a supplementary need.

Activated coenzyme form:

Pyridoxal-5-Phosphate (P5P) is an already activated form of vitamin B6 and also occurs in this form in nature. The water-soluble B vitamin is involved in over 100 enzymatic reactions, especially in amino acid and protein metabolism.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

Vitamin B12 is primarily known for the fact that it is mainly only found in sufficient quantities in animal foods. Therefore, this vegan supplement, consisting of the two forms of vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin & adenosylcobalamin, is ideal for vegetarians and vegans.


	Made using HACCP guidelines, the product does not contain any genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate or other harmful substances.


Recommeneded use:


	Take 5 drops daily.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children and young people.

German packaging: Vitamin B Komplex

The activated vitamin B forms as contained in the Natural Love Vitamin B complex can only be found in a few other products.

The capsules include:


	Bio-active vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin (in a 2: 1 ratio)
	Folic acid as 5MTHF glucosamine folate
	Vitamin B7 as D-biotin


Recommended use:


	Take one capsule a day with plenty of fluids.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
A special feature of the Nature Love Vitamin B12 tablets is the 2:1 ratio of the two active vitamin B12 forms methylcobalamin and adenosylcobalamin. Furthermore, the formulation also contains folic acid (vitamin B9) in the stable form 5-MTHF glucosamine (Quatrefolic® from Gnosis).

Recommended use:


	Swallow 1 tablet every other day with plenty of liquid.
	One pack contains a 6 month supply of the product if taken as recommended.


Note:


	Not suitable for those who are under 18 years of age, pregnant or breastfeeding.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

productTitle: Vitamin B Complex Capsules Forte, 90 capsules
description:
The Vitamin B Complex capsules by ZeinPharma® combine the high-quality vitamins B1, B2, B3, B5, B6, B12, folic acid and biotin in an optimal dose.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with a main meal with still water (at least 200 ml). Do not chew.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: No Synthetic Additives,     Made WITHOUT Animal Testing,     Vegan

description:
Looking for a product that contains vitamin B3 and vitamins B5, B6, B1, B2 and NADH? Then the Active-B Complex by Vitaplex is just the thing for you.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

The biotin tablets combine highly-dosed vitamin B7 with the trace elements zinc and selenium, and do not contain magnesium stearate, a release agent. The tablets can easily be divided or ground into powder to make them easier to take.


	Coating-free tablets
	High bioavailability
	No unnecessary additives


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with sufficient water


Please note:


	Store in a cool, dry place.
	Not suitable for children and adolescents.
	Consult a doctor before use if you're pregnant or breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of choking if you have trouble swallowing or take the tablets without enough liquid.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye,     FREE FROM Magnesium Stearate

description:
Highly dosed vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin) in tablet form


	Vegetarian, hypoallergenic, and free from yeast, wheat, soy and milk


Recommended use :


	Take 1 tablet daily.

Vitamin B12 is found predominantly in animal-based foods. Therefore, it can be difficult for vegans and vegetarians to take in. 

This highly-dosed Vitamin B12 1000 µg supplement is made with a high-quality, bioactive micronutrient from methylcobalamin that the body can use immediately. It does not contain magnesium stearate or any other additives. 

Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with sufficient water.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children or adolescents.
	Consult your doctor before use if you're pregnant or nursing.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye

description:
Riboflavin (vitamin B2), which belongs to the B-group of vitamins, occurs in the human body as a coenzyme in two active forms, namely as flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD) and flavin mononucleotide (FMN), which is also called riboflavin-5-phosphate. With the cooperation of these coenzymes, the B vitamins folic acid and vitamin B6, among others, are converted into their active forms.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

Niacin contributes to:

About Niacin:


	Niacin stimulates the circulation and can trigger temporary, harmless skin redness (flushing).
	These symptoms usually disappear after a few days of use. As an alternative, niacinamide, which does not cause flushing, is recommended.
	8 water-soluble vitamins are contained by this vitamin B complex.
	These have an important function in the nervous system and are involved in the release of energy.
	In case of hypersensitivity, the niacinamide is recommended.


Recommended use:


	take 1 tablet daily


Please note:


	When taking products containing nicotinic acid, you may experience a harmless side effect called a "niacin flush" that expands your blood vessels. This means that for about 10 minutes you could experience reddened skin with an itchy feeling, as well as light, harmless swelling.

features: Made without release agent magnesium stearate
description:
This vitamin contains all 8 B vitamins in ideal ratios. Production takes place according to the highest quality standards and is suitable for vegetarians and vegans. In addition, the tablets are made without the release agent magnesium stearate.

Recommended use: 


	Take 1 tablet daily with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or young people.
	During pregnancy and breastfeeding, you should generally consult a doctor before consuming food supplements.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who have insufficient fluid intake.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

features: Is particularly well absorbed by the body
description:
Vitamin B complex from quinoa in a capsule form


	Quinoa seedlings are grown with vitamin B complex enriched water, soaking up the valuable nutrients into their plant structure.
	This results in a plant-based vitamin B source that is tasty and particularly easily absorbed by the body.
	The ground quinoa seedlings are ground and encapsulated as a natural food supplement.
	The contents of the capsule can also be stirred into yogurt or sprinkled onto a salad to reliably cover your daily requirement of the entire vitamin B spectrum.
	The vitamin B complex made from quinoa covers an increased requirement (120%) with two capsules and offers a complete supply of all eight B vitamins.
	Country of origin: Austria


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule with liquid twice a day
	Also suitable for pregnant and nursing women
	Store cool and dry, do not store above room temperature

features: Contains vitamin B in activated form
Also ideal for vegan & vegetarian diets
description:
B vitamins belong to the group of water-soluble vitamins, are poorly stored in the organism and should therefore be taken regularly as a supplement.


	For vegetarians and vegans, a sufficient supply of vitamin B12 is particularly difficult: the vitamin can only be taken in through the diet, but is only found in animal products.
	In this case, it is particularly advisable to resort to the support of food supplements.
	B-Complex Plus by Pure Encapsulations® is vegan, ideally dosed in capsules and contains B vitamins in their activated form!


Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
Vitamin complex with all 8 B vitamins


	The 8 B vitamins B1 (thiamine), B2 (riboflavin), B6 (pyridoxine), B12 (cobalamin), biotin, folic acid (folate), niacin and pantothenic acid are combined under the term "B-complex" and complement each other in their functions.


Recommended intake:
Take 1 capsule per day with a meal.

Advice:


	B vitamins in adjusted dosage - ideal for long-term use.
	Suitable for children from the age of 12 if there is a supplementary need.

Activated coenzyme form:

Pyridoxal-5-Phosphate (P5P) is an already activated form of vitamin B6 and also occurs in this form in nature. The water-soluble B vitamin is involved in over 100 enzymatic reactions, especially in amino acid and protein metabolism.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

features: Building block for secondary messenger substances

ZeinPharma Myo-Inositol is an excellent source of inositol. Each capsule provides 500mg of pure inositol. The inositol is obtained from the starting substance phytin found in corn.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with sufficient liquid.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Made WITHOUT Animal Testing,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

description:
Niacinamide 1000 mg S/R is a yeast-free vitamin B3 (niacin) with sustained release niacinamide.


	Vegetarian, hypoallergenic, free of yeast, wheat, soy and milk.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily.

Vitamin B12 is essential for cell division and for growth processes. This is especially important for older people and vegetarians, as they may have a higher need for vitamin B12.

Vitamin B12


	Important for energy metabolism
	Contributes to psychological well-being
	For vegans & vegetarians
	Vitamin B12 contributes to normal homocysteine metabolism
	Vitamin B12 contributes to normal red blood cell formation
	Vitamin B12 contributes to a normal function of the immune system and contributes to reducing tiredness and fatigue
	Vitamin B12 has a role in cell division


Recommended use:


	take 1 capsule daily with a meal.

Riboflavin (vitamin B2), which belongs to the B-group of vitamins, occurs in the human body as a coenzyme in two active forms, namely as flavin adenine dinucleotide (FAD) and flavin mononucleotide (FMN), which is also called riboflavin-5-phosphate. With the cooperation of these coenzymes, the B vitamins folic acid and vitamin B6, among others, are converted into their active forms.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

Niacin contributes to:

About Niacin:


	Niacin stimulates the circulation and can trigger temporary, harmless skin redness (flushing).
	These symptoms usually disappear after a few days of use. As an alternative, niacinamide, which does not cause flushing, is recommended.
	8 water-soluble vitamins are contained by this vitamin B complex.
	These have an important function in the nervous system and are involved in the release of energy.
	In case of hypersensitivity, the niacinamide is recommended.


Recommended use:


	take 1 tablet daily


Please note:


	When taking products containing nicotinic acid, you may experience a harmless side effect called a "niacin flush" that expands your blood vessels. This means that for about 10 minutes you could experience reddened skin with an itchy feeling, as well as light, harmless swelling.

description:
Vitamin C is probably the most important water-soluble antioxidant, which, among other things, can help protect cells from oxidative stress. It is not synthesised by our bodies independently and must therefore be completely absorbed through our food.

The Super C Complex S/R is a mixture of 1,000 mg of vitamin C, supplemented with bioflavonoids, rose hips and Acerola cherries, among others ingredients. The two bioflavonoids rutin and hesperidin can help improve the absorbency of vitamin C. Furthermore, Super C Complex offers delayed release.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily or as advised by your physician.

Vitamin C 1000 mg 


	Vitamin C is responsible for numerous processes in our body, has antioxidant properties and cannot be produced by the body itself. With the vitamin C 1000 mg capsules, you have a great daily supply of vitamin C.


Features:


	Capsule shell made of bovine gelatine
	Made without preservatives
	Free of artificial colours and flavours


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with plenty of water or juice.

German packaging: Acerola Vitamin C + Zink

These capsules are made purely with natural Acerola vitamin C combined with organic zinc. The Acerola fruit are similar to cherries and have a high content of natural vitamin C and flavonoids.  

Recommended use: 


	take 2 capsules daily with liquids


Origins: Brazil

Note:


	This natural product is naturally pure (free from any synthetic fillers and additives), and is free of dairy, wheat, and soy allergens, and is suitable for vegans (capsules are made ​​of plant cellulose).

features: For adults & children 5 years old and up
description:
German packaging: Liposomal Vitamin C & Zinc

Liposomal Vitamin C & Zinc by Igennus contains 1,000 mg of liposomal vitamin C and 15 mg of zinc bisglycinate in an optimal ratio with selenium and copper.


	With a natural citrus-vanilla flavour
	Flexible dose for adults and children 5 years and older
	Good tasting smoothie texture
	Can be added to drinks or yoghurt and also be eaten with a spoon


Recommended use:


	Adults and children over 14 years old: 15 ml (3 teaspoons) daily
	Children from 9 to 13 years old: 10 ml (2 teaspoons) daily
	Children from 5 to 8 years old: 5 ml (1 teaspoon) daily


Notes:


	Shake the bottle well before use.
	Do not take Liposomal Vitamin C & Zinc on an empty stomach, take it with a meal.
	Mix in water, milk or yoghurt or take directly from a spoon.
	People who are sensitive to vitamin C can split the daily dose between morning and evening and dilute it with liquid.
	Do not take without consulting a doctor if you are pregnant, nursing or taking medication.

productTitle: Organic Acerola Vitamin C Powder, 100 g
features: Made from Acerola cherries and Aronia berries
Stir into liquid or sprinkle over food
description:
The Acerola is a cherry-like fruit with 30 times more vitamin C than lemons. It is one of the most vitamin C-rich fruits in the world.

The aronia berry is also rich in natural vitamin C, but is best known for its high content of anthocyanins and OPC (like in grape seeds).

Recommended use:


	Stir 1 heaping teaspoon into liquid daily or sprinkle over food.
	For people with increased needs (eg smokers or people with colds), the dose can be taken several times a day.


Tips from the Manufacturer:


	Natural vitamin C can be a pick-me-up, so taking it in the morning is recommended.
	It is easy to integrate this product into your daily life.

features: In the form of calcium ascorbate

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with sufficient liquid.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Made WITHOUT Animal Testing,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

description:
This blend of vitamin C and zinc is particularly popular in the autumn and winter. The supplement can be taken long-term and is highly dosed.


	To support the best bioavailability, the supplement does not contain magnesium stearate; microcrystalline cellulose is used instead.
	Made without any other additives.


Recommend use:


	Take ½ tablet each after a meal with sufficient water in the morning and in the evening
	360 tablets are sufficient for 12 months.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children or adolescents.
	In cases of kidney stones, diseases in which too much iron is stored in the body, and glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase deficiency, consult a doctor before use.
	Consult a doctor before taking if you're pregnant or nursing.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian,     FREE FROM Magnesium Stearate

description:
Buffered Vitamin C

Esterified Vitamin C (formerly EsterPlex) is naturally chelated, pH neutral, and 100% acid-free. It promises a high bioavailability and is intended for people who are unable to tolerate ascorbic acid in its pure form.


	Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) is the most important water-soluble antioxidant. Vitamin C must be obtained from food because the body cannot produce it itself.
	Buffered Vitamin C is a suitable alternative for people who can not tolerate the normal form.
	Gentle on the stomach and the digestive system.
	Vegetarian • Hypoallergenic • free of yeast, wheat, corn, soy and milk


Recommended use:


	take 1 tablet daily.

Vitamin C can support the immune system and can contribute to normal collagen formation. The buffered version of the vitamin is gentler on the stomach, and is easy to does in its powdered form. 

Recommended use:


	Mix 1 scoop of powder per day with a glass of water (150 ml) and consume with a meal.

features: With 1000 mg of vitamin C per tablet
Without the release agent magnesium stearate
description:
Vitamin C is one of the most popular of vitamins and is highly dosed in this product. The tablets also contain zinc.

Recommended use: 


	Take 1 tablet 1 x daily with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or teens.
	Consult a doctor before consuming food supplements during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who do not drink enough water.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegan,     Vegetarian

attributes.name: General Information
attributes.value: Consult your doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing

productTitle: Iron, Vitamin C + Folic Acid Syrup, 150 ml
description:
This syrup is the perfect addition to a varied diet. Due to the high content of iron, vitamin C and folic acid, it is perfectly suitable for all those who have a higher need for iron. This product is particularly suitable for children, athletes, vegetarians or during pregnancy. In addition, the syrup has a delicious taste.

The syrup consists of:


	Honey
	Folic acid
	Royal jelly
	Beetroot juice
	Vitamin C
	Iron


Consumption recommendation:


	Children between 3-9 years: 1 teaspoon (= 10ml) twice a day.
	Children and adolescents between 10-18 years: 3 teaspoons (= 15ml) once a day.
	Adults: 3 teaspoons (= 15ml) once a day.
	Pregnant women: 3 teaspoons (= 30ml) twice a day.
	Breastfeeding mothers: 2 teaspoons (= 20ml) twice a day.

These supplements contain buffered vitamin C as calcium ascorbate and zinc, a trace element. 

This high quality tablets by Vitamaze feature:


	High bioavailability 
	No unnecessary additives, such as magnesium stearate or dyes
	Vegan and allergy-free ingredients


Buffered vitamin C has an almost neutral pH value, making it easy on the stomach.

The tablets can be broken in half to mkae them easier to swallow, and are made without a coating.


	Tablet size: 2.3 x 0.6 cm


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet in the morning and 1 in the evening after a meal with sufficient water.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children or adolescents.
	Consult a doctor before use if you are pregnant or nursing.
	In cases of kidney stones from oxalate, certain diseases in which too much iron is stored in the body, as well as glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase deficiencies, the product should only be taken after consulting a doctor.

	Take 1 vegetarian capsule daily with a meal or a glass of water.

features: Manufactured according to the HACCP concept
description:
This premium quality vitamin C is obtained from natural acerola extract and carefully manufactured under the strictest quality regulations. According to HACCP guidelines, genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate and other additives are completely avoided in this recipe.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with plenty of water.


Note:


	Not suitable for children and young people.

These capsules contain only high-quality vitamin C from ascorbic acid in a buffered form. This processing method produces a gentle, acid-free vitamin C.


	Highly dosed with 1000 mg vitamin C per daily dose.


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with sufficient liquid.


Note:


	Not suitable for pregnant or breastfeeding people, children, or adolescents.
	Not suitable for people with kidney disease.

description:
This syrup is the perfect addition to a varied diet. Due to the high content of iron, vitamin C and folic acid, it is perfectly suitable for all those who have a higher need for iron. 	Beetroot juice
	Vitamin C
	Iron

	Children and adolescents between 10-18 years: 3 teaspoons (= 15ml) once a day.
	Adults: 3 teaspoons (= 15ml) once a day.

description:
Vitamin D is formed under the influence of UV-B rays of sunlight in the skin cells. 


	VIT D3 / VIT K2 delivers both fat-soluble vitamins D and K together in vegetarian capsules.
	Vitamin D is a vitamin that can be produced by the body. The vitamin D synthesis is carried out in the skin with the help of sunlight.
	Many people develop a vitamin D deficiency in winter when the sun doesn't shine as much. A dietary supplement of Vitamin D is therefore especially important in the winter.
	Vitamin K is provided as menaquinone-7 in the tablets. 


Recommended use:


	Take 1 vegetarian capsule daily with plenty of fluid.

	Not suitable for children and young people.

Vitamin D is responsible for many factors in the body. Vitaplex's vitamin D contains 3,000 IU vitamin D3 per drop. The vitamin D3 is extracted from wool fat. The product is free from known allergens and suitable for a vegetarian diet.


	Dissolved in MCTs from coconut oil
	High bioavailability


Recommended use:


	The manufacturer recommends taking 1 drop daily.


Notes:


	Store in a cool, dry place.
	Not suitable for children under 10 years.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     Vegetarian,     WITHOUT Dye,     FREE FROM Preservatives,     Hypoallergenic

features: 350 mcg Vitamin D3 per softgel capsule
description:
ZeinPharma's vitamin D3 provides 14000 IU of high-dose, natural vitamin D3 from lanolin per softgel capsule.


	This corresponds to 25 μg of vitamin D3 per day
	Naturally obtained from Lanolin (wool)
	Very good availability


Recommended use:


	Once every 2 weeks, take a softgel capsule whole with plenty of still water (at least 200 ml) with a meal.


Please note:


	Since vitamin D3 is liposoluble, it is recommended to take the capsules with a fatty meal or to take them with Krill or omega-3 oil at the same time.

attributes.value: No Synthetic Additives,     Made WITHOUT Animal Testing

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

productTitle: Pure & Essential Daily Vitamin D3 2000IU, 365 tablets
description:
These all-natural vitamin D tablets are easy to swallow and are easily absorbed by the body. The tablets can be consumed all year round if needed. They are ideal for everyday use.

Recommended use: 


	Adults and children 11 years old or older: take 1 tablet daily. You can take the tablet with food.


Notes:


	Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
	This product is not a substitute for a balanced diet.
	Pregnant and breastfeeding people should consult a doctor before use.
	Keep out of the reach of children.
	Store out of sunlight.

productTitle: Vitamin D3 + K2 Kids Chewable Tablets, 120 chewable tablets
description:
The vitamin D3 + K2 chewable tablets have been specially developed for children and adolescents.


	BjökoVit uses vitamin D3 from high-quality lichen extract and vitamin K2 MK7 all-trans, which is obtained from the Japanese food, natto.


The delicious chewable tablets taste like oranges and passion fruit and are sweetened only with xylitol (birch sugar).

Recommended use:


	Chew one tablet daily

features: Supportive during periods of physical stress
description:
The Salt & Electrolytes capsules by Saltolyte contain salt and many important minerals like magnesium, iron, zinc and calcium, as well as vitamin D3. This recipe was specially developed for intensive training sessions, exercising in high temperatures or competitions. The bioavailable capsules are tasteless, vegetarian, and gluten, lactose and fructose free. 

The capsules can be combined with sports drinks or gels. They can be taken simply with water, do not leave a salty aftertaste, and are easy to take on the go. 

Recommended use: 


	Swallow one capsule at intervals of 30 to 60 minutes with a little water. Alternatively, you can drink the contents dissolved in liquid.
	Please note: During sustained physical exertion, take up to a maximum of 15 capsules daily.

features: Vitamin D source from the cane sugar
description:
The Vitamin D Vegan by BIOBENE contains 2000 IU pure vitamin D.


	From a purely vegetable source of vitamin D (from cane sugar).


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with a glass of water. At best take before or after a fatty meal over a period of at least 3 months.

productTitle: Vitamin D3 200 I.U. + K2 15 µg Family Drops, 20 ml
features: Vitamin D3 from a natural source of lanolin
description:
This MCT oil is based on coconut oil and has been supplemented with valuable vitamins D3 and K2. Vitamin D3 is obtained from natural sources of lanolin. The Vitamin D3 200 IU + K2 15 µg Family Drops are ideal for the whole family and free from preservatives, flavourings and colourings. The oil does not contain soy or any other additives. In addition, regular controls guarantee consistently high quality.

Consumption recommendation:
From 10 years and up: 2 drops (400 IU) daily.
For children between 4 - 9 years: 1 drop per day.
From 1 - 4 years: 1 drop every 2 days.
Adults: 4 - 5 drops a day.

Info:


	Made in Germany
	The use of vitamin K-containing food supplements should be discussed with a doctor if you are also taking anticoagulant medication.

This high-dose, plant-based supplement contains fat-soluble vitamins D and K dissolved in high-quality MCT coconut oil that supports optimal bioavailability.

About the vitamins:


	The vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) in the supplements is extracted from Spanish moss using UV-B radiation.
	The vitamin K2 is added in the form of MK7 all-trans and is extracted from fermented soybeans.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 undiluted drop daily.

When our daily vitamin D needs are not being met due to lack of sun, Nature Love's highly dosed vitamin D3 drops are just the ticket!


	Suitable for vegetarians


Recommended use:


	Take 1 undiluted drop daily. Wipe the pipette 3 times on the rim of the bottle, then take 1 drop.


Note:


	Not suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding people, children, and adolescents.

attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
German packaging: Vitamin D3+K2

This super combination by Nature Love offers valuable vitamin D3 and high-quality vitamin K2. MCT oil made from coconuts provides increased bioavailability because the vitamins D3 and K2 are fat-soluble.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 drop undiluted daily.

attributes.name: Allergens
attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
Dr. Ehrenberger offers you vitamin D3 and K2 in liquid form. For optimal absorption, the fat-soluble vitamins are embedded in high-quality chia seed oil and olive oil. The high-quality antioxidant organic rosemary extract provides a mild taste. The product is especially recommended for people over 50 and women before, during or after menopause.


	Vitamin K2 (menaquinone-quality 7 from natto)
	Cholecalciferol (vitamin D3 from lichen)
	100% vegan and of natural origin
	Suitable for vegans, vegetarians, diabetics, pregnant and nursing people and children


Recommended dosage:
Drop 10 drops daily with the pipette directly into the mouth or over food.
Preferably with a fatty meal.

The vitamin D in these tablets comes in the form of vitamin D3. Obtained from lanolin, the vitamins are suitable for vegetarians.


	In addition, nano particle-free microcrystalline cellulose is used instead of magnesium stearate


Recommended use: 


	Take 1 tablet every 20 days with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or teens.
	Consult a doctor before consuming food supplements during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who do not drink enough water.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegetarian

productTitle: Vitamin D3 1000 IE with 100 Mcg Vitamin K2, 90 veg. capsules
description:
Vitamin D is formed under the influence of UV-B rays of sunlight in the skin cells. 


	VIT D3 / VIT K2 delivers both fat-soluble vitamins D and K together in vegetarian capsules.
	Vitamin D is a vitamin that can be produced by the body. The vitamin D synthesis is carried out in the skin with the help of sunlight.
	Many people develop a vitamin D deficiency in winter when the sun doesn't shine as much. A dietary supplement of Vitamin D is therefore especially important in the winter.
	Vitamin K is provided as menaquinone-7 in the tablets. 


Recommended use:


	Take 1 vegetarian capsule daily with plenty of fluid.

features: With a pipette made of natural rubber
description:
A combination of MCT and olive oil offers an optimal interaction of the two fat-soluble vitamins D3 and K2. The vitamin D found in these drops comes from cholecalciferol. The vitamin K2 is from menaquinone MK7.


	Vitamaze is known for producing its products according to the HACCP concept, which is why these vitamin drops are completely free of genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate or other harmful substances.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 drop daily.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children and young people.
	If you are taking anticoagulant medication, speak to your doctor before taking it.

Vitamin D, also known under the synonym "sun vitamin", is absorbed through the skin by the sun's rays. Mostly in winter, but also in summer, various interfering factors can lead to limited natural absorption. Vitamin D3 capsules from Pure Encapsulations provide 25mcg of cholecalciferol per capsule and are suitable for year-round use.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule every 2 days with a meal.

Notes:


	Not intended for daily consumption.

The Vitamin D3 200 IU + K2 15 µg Family Drops are ideal for the whole family and free from preservatives, flavourings and colourings. The oil does not contain soy or any other additives. In addition, regular controls guarantee consistently high quality.

Consumption recommendation:
From 10 years and up: 2 drops (400 IU) daily.
For children between 4 - 9 years: 1 drop per day.
From 1 - 4 years: 1 drop every 2 days.
Adults: 4 - 5 drops a day.

Info:


	Made in Germany
	The use of vitamin K-containing food supplements should be discussed with a doctor if you are also taking anticoagulant medication.

This high-dose, plant-based supplement contains fat-soluble vitamins D and K dissolved in high-quality MCT coconut oil that supports optimal bioavailability.

About the vitamins:


	The vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) in the supplements is extracted from Spanish moss using UV-B radiation.
	The vitamin K2 is added in the form of MK7 all-trans and is extracted from fermented soybeans.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 undiluted drop daily.

When our daily vitamin D needs are not being met due to lack of sun, Nature Love's highly dosed vitamin D3 drops are just the ticket!


	Suitable for vegetarians


Recommended use:


	Take 1 undiluted drop daily. Wipe the pipette 3 times on the rim of the bottle, then take 1 drop.


Note:


	Not suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding people, children, and adolescents.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

German packaging: Vitamin D3+K2

This super combination by Nature Love offers valuable vitamin D3 and high-quality vitamin K2. MCT oil made from coconuts provides increased bioavailability because the vitamins D3 and K2 are fat-soluble.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 drop undiluted daily.

description:

These high-dose vitamin D3 capsules contain 5000 IU of natural lanolin and one capsule per week is enough.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule whole with plenty of fluid with a meal
	Take once a week

	Do not take more often than once every 7 days
	An intake of once a week corresponds to a daily dose of 17.8 mcg (714 IU)

Recommended use:
Take 1 capsule every 5 days with a meal.

description:
Dr. Ehrenberger offers you vitamin D3 and K2 in liquid form. For optimal absorption, the fat-soluble vitamins are embedded in high-quality chia seed oil and olive oil. The high-quality antioxidant organic rosemary extract provides a mild taste. The product is especially recommended for people over 50 and women before, during or after menopause.


	Vitamin K2 (menaquinone-quality 7 from natto)
	Cholecalciferol (vitamin D3 from lichen)
	100% vegan and of natural origin
	Suitable for vegans, vegetarians, diabetics, pregnant and nursing people and children


Recommended dosage:
Drop 10 drops daily with the pipette directly into the mouth or over food.
Preferably with a fatty meal.

The vitamin D in these tablets comes in the form of vitamin D3. Obtained from lanolin, the vitamins are suitable for vegetarians.


	In addition, nano particle-free microcrystalline cellulose is used instead of magnesium stearate


Recommended use: 


	Take 1 tablet every 20 days with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or teens.
	Consult a doctor before consuming food supplements during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who do not drink enough water.

attributes.name: Product Features
attributes.value: Allergen-Free,     GMO-Free,     No Synthetic Additives,     Vegetarian

productTitle: Vitamin D3 1000 IE with 100 Mcg Vitamin K2, 90 veg. capsules
description:
Vitamin D is formed under the influence of UV-B rays of sunlight in the skin cells. 


	VIT D3 / VIT K2 delivers both fat-soluble vitamins D and K together in vegetarian capsules.
	Vitamin D is a vitamin that can be produced by the body. The vitamin D synthesis is carried out in the skin with the help of sunlight.
	Many people develop a vitamin D deficiency in winter when the sun doesn't shine as much. A dietary supplement of Vitamin D is therefore especially important in the winter.
	Vitamin K is provided as menaquinone-7 in the tablets. 


Recommended use:


	Take 1 vegetarian capsule daily with plenty of fluid.

features: With a pipette made of natural rubber
description:
A combination of MCT and olive oil offers an optimal interaction of the two fat-soluble vitamins D3 and K2. The vitamin D found in these drops comes from cholecalciferol. The vitamin K2 is from menaquinone MK7.


	Vitamaze is known for producing its products according to the HACCP concept, which is why these vitamin drops are completely free of genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers, magnesium stearate or other harmful substances.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 drop daily.


Notes:


	Not suitable for children and young people.
	If you are taking anticoagulant medication, speak to your doctor before taking it.

Vitamin D, also known under the synonym "sun vitamin", is absorbed through the skin by the sun's rays. Mostly in winter, but also in summer, various interfering factors can lead to limited natural absorption. Vitamin D3 capsules from Pure Encapsulations provide 25mcg of cholecalciferol per capsule and are suitable for year-round use.

Directions for Use:
1 capsule every 2 days with a meal.

Notes:


	Not intended for daily consumption.

productTitle: Pure & Essential Daily Vitamin D3 2000IU, 365 tablets
description:
These all-natural vitamin D tablets are easy to swallow and are easily absorbed by the body. The tablets can be consumed all year round if needed. They are ideal for everyday use.

Recommended use: 


	Adults and children 11 years old or older: take 1 tablet daily. You can take the tablet with food.


Notes:


	Do not exceed the recommended daily dose.
	This product is not a substitute for a balanced diet.
	Pregnant and breastfeeding people should consult a doctor before use.
	Keep out of the reach of children.
	Store out of sunlight.

productTitle: Vitamin D3 + K2 Kids Chewable Tablets, 120 chewable tablets
description:
The vitamin D3 + K2 chewable tablets have been specially developed for children and adolescents.


	BjökoVit uses vitamin D3 from high-quality lichen extract and vitamin K2 MK7 all-trans, which is obtained from the Japanese food, natto.


The delicious chewable tablets taste like oranges and passion fruit and are sweetened only with xylitol (birch sugar).

Recommended use:


	Chew one tablet daily

features: Supportive during periods of physical stress
description:
The Salt & Electrolytes capsules by Saltolyte contain salt and many important minerals like magnesium, iron, zinc and calcium, as well as vitamin D3. This recipe was specially developed for intensive training sessions, exercising in high temperatures or competitions. The bioavailable capsules are tasteless, vegetarian, and gluten, lactose and fructose free. 

The capsules can be combined with sports drinks or gels. They can be taken simply with water, do not leave a salty aftertaste, and are easy to take on the go. 

Recommended use: 


	Swallow one capsule at intervals of 30 to 60 minutes with a little water. Alternatively, you can drink the contents dissolved in liquid.
	Please note: During sustained physical exertion, take up to a maximum of 15 capsules daily.

features: Vitamin D source from the cane sugar
description:
The Vitamin D Vegan by BIOBENE contains 2000 IU pure vitamin D.


	From a purely vegetable source of vitamin D (from cane sugar).


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with a glass of water. At best take before or after a fatty meal over a period of at least 3 months.

productTitle: Organic Siberian Cedar Nut Oil, 100 ml
description:
The amber-coloured oil is obtained through an elaborate but gentle cold pressing process and is characterised by its pleasantly nutty taste and a notable vitamin E content.


	Origin of raw materials: Russia


Note for allergy sufferers:


	May contain traces of gluten, nuts, soy and sesame due to production.

productTitle: Vitamin E 400 IU Mixed Tocopherols, 60 softgels
features: Include alpha, beta, gamma and delta tocopherols
With a quality guarantee from an independent laboratory
description:
Vitamin E actually isn't just one vitamin but is a group of substances called tocopherols and tocotrienols.


	The best-known form of vitamin E is alpha-tocopherol.


Recommended use:


	take 1 soft gel daily

Phytopharma Vitamin E capsules are 100% vegan thanks to the capsule shells made from tapioca starch. They contain wheat germ oil and are lactose-free.

Recommended dose:
Swallow 1 capsule daily with sufficient liquid. Do not chew.

Note:
May contain gluten.

Delta Fraction Tocotrienols contains tocotrienols from annatto beans and is free of tocopherols. Tocotrienols have a stronger antioxidant activity than tocopherols.

Recommended use:


	Take 1-2 softgels 1-2 times a day with meals.

Tocomin SupraBio® contains a mixed tocotrienol complex of pure palm oil with a natural alpha-, beta-, gamma- and delta-tocotrienol ratio.


	It is extracted from fresh, red palm oil.
	This special composition allows for improved absorption.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 softgel 2 times daily with meals.

Orthica® E-400 + contains vitamin E from natural sources.


	Vitamin E is an antioxidant and is contained in the capsules as a tocopherol mix.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule per day, preferably during or after a meal.

Argan oil obtained from the kernels of ripe argan berries serves as the basis for these vitamin E drops from Kräutermax. To make the oil, the dried fruit are taken off of the tree and split. Then the pulp is removed and the seeds are sorted out and roasted and ground in a stone or metal mill. With the addition of water, this paste becomes a slurry. This slurry is processed until the oil emerges. When the seed platelets are roasted, the bitter substances contained in the seeds are significantly reduced.


	Quality checked by specialist staff
	Made with carefully selected ingredients
	Premium quality
	Subject to strict quality controls
	Made without plastic softeners, dyes and anti-caking agents
	Environmentally friendly amber glass bottle


Recommended use: 


	Drop 2 drops on the tongue once a day.


Note:


	Not suitable for children under 12 years old.

Vegetable vitamin E consists largely of the biologically active tocopherols D-alpha, beta and gamma-tocopherol.

Pure Encapsulations® Vitamin E is well tolerated and has optimal bioavailability. Pure Encapsulations® Vitamin E is standardised to 400 IU d-alpha-tocopherol per capsule.

Consumption recommendation:
1 capsule per day with a meal.

Note:
Not intended for consumption by children under 15 years of age.

description:
The Orthomolecular Micronutrient Complex with bioactive vitamin K2 and menaquinone-7 in a synergistic combination with calcium and omega 3 fatty acids. A top-quality product. 

The physiological function of these nutrients:


	Vitamin K is comprised of a group of fat-soluble vitamins that contribute to the maintenance of normal bones and blood.
	Calcium is the most important mineral in our body. It is required in particular for the maintenance of normal bone health.
	Omega 3 is an essential polyunsaturated fatty acid. Since our body cannot produce it, we must absorb it through our diet.
	VITAMIN K plus contains pure vegetable omega 3 from flaxseed, which improves the bioavailability of the fat-soluble vitamin K.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule daily with plenty of water
	If you are taking blood thinners, talk to your doctor or pharmacist before taking this product!

features: Vitamin K2 MK7 from fermented soybeans
description:
The vitamin K2 capsules by BjökoVit contain pure vitamin K2 MK7 from Natto and is suitable for both vegetarians and vegans. Each pack contains 60 capsules with a plant-based capsule shell.

What is Natto:
Small soybeans that are fermented with the help of a special bacterium (Bacillus subtilis ssp. Natto) are known as Natto. The beans are soaked in water overnight, boiled and steamed the next day and then inoculated with the bacteria. During the fermentation, the characteristic strong umami taste develops. Most importantly, Natto has a very high content of vitamin K2. Soybeans naturally contain vitamin K2, but this increases 100-fold during fermentation.

Recommended use:
Take 1 capsule per day.

These lozenges are sweetened with xylitol and contain vegan vitamin K2 (Menaquinone-7) in its bioactive all-trans form.


	Natto (fermented soybeans) is a natural source of vitamin K2.
	With a fruity apple flavour!


Recommended use:


	Suck on 1 tablet daily before or after a meal.

The Vitamin K2 200 µg capsules by ZeinPharma contain vitamin K2 in the form of MK-7 (menaquinone-7). The capsules are vegan and do not contain added colours, preservatives and magnesium stearate.

Recommended dose:
Swallow 1 capsule daily with plenty of water with or after a meal. Do not chew.

Instructions:


	Those who are taking anticoagulant medication should seek medical advice before taking vitamin K supplements.
	Contains a dessicant sachet. This is not suitable for consumption.

description:
What is Life Light® MultiAll?


	A high quality multi-spectrum vitamin for a meaningful daily supply of orthomolecular micronutrients.


How does Life Light® MultiAll work? 


	A characteristic feature is a newly developed "all in one" formula for a daily basis supply of vitamins, trace elements and minerals to complement your daily diet.
	As a special bonus, the formula also contains important vitaminoids, plant enzymes and bioactive plant compounds.


Vitamin complex




	Life Light® MultiAll is a high-quality vitamin blend with the fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E and K, as well as the water-soluble B-vitamins and vitamin C.


Functions of Vitamins:


	Vitamin A contributes to normal iron metabolism
	Vitamin A contributes to maintaining normal vision
	Vitamin D contributes to normal recovery of calcium and phosphorus
	Vitamin D contributes to maintaining normal muscle function
	Vitamin E and C contributes to protecting the cells from oxidative stress
	Vitamin K contributes to normal blood clotting
	The B vitamins contribute to energy metabolism and normal function of the immune system
	Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for the normal function of blood vessels
	Vitamin C contributes to normal psychological function


Minerals and trace elements


	Trace elements are essential to life and are involved in important metabolic processes.
	Life Light® MultiAll contains a specially tuned mineral and trace element blend with potassium, manganese, zinc, selenium, chromium and molybdenum, as well as naturally bound calcium and magnesium in the optimum efficiency ratio 2: 1.
	The minerals phosphorus and sodium and the trace elements copper, iron and iodine were deliberately left out of the recipe so that Life Light® MultiAll can also be used by people with a controlled intake of these substances.


Vitaminoids- and enzyme complex


	As a special feature, Life Light ® MultiAll also contains alpha lipoic acid, L-carnitine, coenzyme Q10, and the plant enzymes bromelain and papain, and L-glutathione.
	Coenzyme Q10 (ubiquinone) is also an endogenous substance, that occurs in all cells.


Recommended Use


	Take 2 capsules with plenty of water. Take for at least 3 months, consult your doctor if you wish to take longer.


What is so special about Life Light® MultiAll?


	High-quality, hypoallergenic ingredients without additives
	1 capsule covers approximately 50% of the recommended average daily dose of the micronutrients contained (according to Directive 2008/100 / EC).
	2 capsules cover 100 percent of average daily needs. The specific dosage can be adapted with consultation from your doctor. 
	Free of allergens, lactose-, gluten- and artificial additives.


Meaningfully combined with: 
Life Light® Olive Leaf Elixir

	Source of Life stands for whole-food-based multivitamins and nutritional supplements. These combine effective dosages of individual vitamins, minerals and other nutrients with whole-food concentrates from original foods.
	Source of Life is a meal replacement with a muesli flavour, is rich in plant proteins. The comprehensive, balanced multivitamin with whole food concentrates including vitamins, minerals, lipids, bioflavonoids, enzymes, plant pigments, amino and nucleic acids, herbs, wholegrain rice, spirulina, bee pollen, barley grass, sunflower oil, carrots and black currant seeds.
	One serving contains about the same amount of vital substances as a daily dose consisting of 3 tablets original Source of Life.


Recommended use:


	Mix 2 scoops of powder (about 39g) with about 250 ml (low-fat) milk or water

Life Light Prosta effect is a high-quality micronutrient complex with selenium and zinc for men.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily at breakfast with water.

productTitle: ACE + Selenium + Zinc & Black Seed Oil, 60 capsules
description:
German packaging: ACE + Selen + Zink & Schwarzkümmelöl

Pure Egyptian black cumin oil from gently cold-pressed cumin seeds is used to make this supplement. Based on beta-carotene, acerola extract, vitamin E, zinc gluconate and selenium yeast, the product is safe for lactose-intolerant people. 

Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule 1 x daily with liquid.
	Duration of use: use for a maximum of 3 months


Notes:


	May contain traces of yeast.
	Contains soy.

This composition of 12 essential vitamins and important trace elements and minerals is supplemented with extracts from marigold and Mexican marigold.

The capsules are produced in Germany according to the highest quality standards and the HACCP concept. The capsules do not contain the release agent magnesium stearate, genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers or other pollutants.

Recommended use: 


	Take 1 capsule daily after a meal with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or teens.
	Consult a doctor before consuming food supplements during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who do not drink enough water.

description:
Vitamins K and D are fat-soluble vitamins. The Pure Encapsulations® Vitamin Duo contains 2 naturally occurring forms of Vitamin K: Vitamin K1 (phylloquinone) and Vitamin K2 (Menaquinone) as well as Vitamin D3.


	The vitamin D3 is derived from lanolin, from sheep's wool, after shearing the sheep. This makes our vitamin D3 vegetarian, but not vegan.
	The vitamin K1 and vitamin K2 (Menaquinone-4) are synthetic. The vitamin K2 (MK-7) is extracted from the flower extracts geraniol and farnesol.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule every 2 days with a meal.


Please note:


	Children, pregnant or nursing women or people taking anticoagulants should only use this product after consulting a doctor. 
	Not intended for daily consumption.

In addition to iron, this comprehensive nutrient complex contains vitamins C and E, a vitamin B complex and other complementary minerals and nutrients.


	Vegetarian
	Free from yeast, wheat and milk


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with a meal


Note:


	Excessive iron levels can promote the growth of unwanted microbes.

Nutrient 950®E contains a variety of vitamins, minerals and trace elements. In addition, the hypoallergenic formulation uses nature-identical, activated compounds.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 x 1 capsule per day with meals.


Please note:


	Smokers are recommended to take less than 20mg of beta carotene per day.

These capsules consist of the natural glandular extract from cattle, which is gently freeze-dried and filled into the capsules. In addition, the formulation is hypoallergenic. Also ideal for on the go.

Consumption recommendation:
Take 1 capsule 1 x daily or as directed by a doctor

Note:

Consult a doctor before use if you are pregnant, breastfeeding or taking medication

description:
What is Life Light® MultiAll?


	A high quality multi-spectrum vitamin for a meaningful daily supply of orthomolecular micronutrients.


How does Life Light® MultiAll work? 


	A characteristic feature is a newly developed "all in one" formula for a daily basis supply of vitamins, trace elements and minerals to complement your daily diet.
	As a special bonus, the formula also contains important vitaminoids, plant enzymes and bioactive plant compounds.


Vitamin complex




	Life Light® MultiAll is a high-quality vitamin blend with the fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E and K, as well as the water-soluble B-vitamins and vitamin C.


Functions of Vitamins:


	Vitamin A contributes to normal iron metabolism
	Vitamin A contributes to maintaining normal vision
	Vitamin D contributes to normal recovery of calcium and phosphorus
	Vitamin D contributes to maintaining normal muscle function
	Vitamin E and C contributes to protecting the cells from oxidative stress
	Vitamin K contributes to normal blood clotting
	The B vitamins contribute to energy metabolism and normal function of the immune system
	Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for the normal function of blood vessels
	Vitamin C contributes to normal psychological function


Minerals and trace elements


	Trace elements are essential to life and are involved in important metabolic processes.
	Life Light® MultiAll contains a specially tuned mineral and trace element blend with potassium, manganese, zinc, selenium, chromium and molybdenum, as well as naturally bound calcium and magnesium in the optimum efficiency ratio 2: 1.
	The minerals phosphorus and sodium and the trace elements copper, iron and iodine were deliberately left out of the recipe so that Life Light® MultiAll can also be used by people with a controlled intake of these substances.


Vitaminoids- and enzyme complex


	As a special feature, Life Light ® MultiAll also contains alpha lipoic acid, L-carnitine, coenzyme Q10, and the plant enzymes bromelain and papain, and L-glutathione.
	Coenzyme Q10 (ubiquinone) is also an endogenous substance, that occurs in all cells.


Recommended Use


	Take 2 capsules with plenty of water. Take for at least 3 months, consult your doctor if you wish to take longer.


What is so special about Life Light® MultiAll?


	High-quality, hypoallergenic ingredients without additives
	1 capsule covers approximately 50% of the recommended average daily dose of the micronutrients contained (according to Directive 2008/100 / EC).
	2 capsules cover 100 percent of average daily needs. The specific dosage can be adapted with consultation from your doctor. 
	Free of allergens, lactose-, gluten- and artificial additives.


Meaningfully combined with: 
Life Light® Olive Leaf Elixir

productTitle: Pure & Essential Advanced Multivitamin & Minerals, 60 tablets
description:
This product is a true a jack of all trades of nutritional supplements. The product contains 22 vitamins and minerals that are perfect for adults and children 12 years old or older. The tablets are easy to swallow and are also ideal for travelling.

Recommended use:


	Adults: take 1 tablet twice a day with food.
	Children 12 years and up: take 1 tablet daily.


Notes:


	This product contains iron which can be harmful if consumed in excess by young children.
	Pregnant or breastfeeding people should consult a doctor before use.
	Store in a cool, dry place out of direct sunlight.

description:
Multi-vitamin & mineral formula for children with wholefood concentrates. Vitamins in fun animal shapes.

Animal Parade combines a base of 15 vitamins and 8 minerals or trace elements with activating whole food concentrates from the alga Spirulina among other valuable amino acids.


	In addition, extracts from carrots with carotene, broccoli, and spinach were added. Spinach contains chlorophyll, which has a similar structure as the red blood pigment haemoglobin.
	Contains extracts of apples with important minerals and trace elements.
	4 vegetables, 8 kinds of fruit and other nutrients from rosehips and sunflower oil were processed.
	Animal shapes: lions, hippopotamuses, tigers and elephants provide delicious natural flavours.
	Nature's Plus products are 100% natural.
	With quality guarantees from independent laboratories.
	Wheat-, yeast-, corn-, soy- and milk- free.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 to 2 vitamins daily. For children over two years old.

	Animal Parade GOLD is an award-winning, sugar-free vitamin and mineral multi, the composition of which is specially tailored to the needs of children. 	Take 2 capsules 2 times daily with plenty of liquid.

description:
Vitamins K and D are fat-soluble vitamins. The Pure Encapsulations® Vitamin Duo contains 2 naturally occurring forms of Vitamin K: Vitamin K1 (phylloquinone) and Vitamin K2 (Menaquinone) as well as Vitamin D3.


	The vitamin D3 is derived from lanolin, from sheep's wool, after shearing the sheep. This makes our vitamin D3 vegetarian, but not vegan.
	The vitamin K1 and vitamin K2 (Menaquinone-4) are synthetic. The vitamin K2 (MK-7) is extracted from the flower extracts geraniol and farnesol.


Recommended use:


	Take 1 capsule every 2 days with a meal.


Please note:


	Children, pregnant or nursing women or people taking anticoagulants should only use this product after consulting a doctor. 
	Not intended for daily consumption.

In addition to iron, this comprehensive nutrient complex contains vitamins C and E, a vitamin B complex and other complementary minerals and nutrients.


	Vegetarian
	Free from yeast, wheat and milk


Recommended use:


	Take 1 tablet daily with a meal


Note:


	Excessive iron levels can promote the growth of unwanted microbes.

Nutrient 950®E contains a variety of vitamins, minerals and trace elements. In addition, the hypoallergenic formulation uses nature-identical, activated compounds.

Recommended use:


	Take 2 x 1 capsule per day with meals.


Please note:


	Smokers are recommended to take less than 20mg of beta carotene per day.

Note:

Consult a doctor before use if you are pregnant, breastfeeding or taking medication

attributes.value: Gluten-free,     Shellfish-Free,     Egg-free,     Fish-free,     Peanut-Free,     Soy free,     Lactose-free

description:
What is Life Light® MultiAll?


	A high quality multi-spectrum vitamin for a meaningful daily supply of orthomolecular micronutrients.


How does Life Light® MultiAll work? 


	A characteristic feature is a newly developed "all in one" formula for a daily basis supply of vitamins, trace elements and minerals to complement your daily diet.
	As a special bonus, the formula also contains important vitaminoids, plant enzymes and bioactive plant compounds.


Vitamin complex




	Life Light® MultiAll is a high-quality vitamin blend with the fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E and K, as well as the water-soluble B-vitamins and vitamin C.


Functions of Vitamins:


	Vitamin A contributes to normal iron metabolism
	Vitamin A contributes to maintaining normal vision
	Vitamin D contributes to normal recovery of calcium and phosphorus
	Vitamin D contributes to maintaining normal muscle function
	Vitamin E and C contributes to protecting the cells from oxidative stress
	Vitamin K contributes to normal blood clotting
	The B vitamins contribute to energy metabolism and normal function of the immune system
	Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for the normal function of blood vessels
	Vitamin C contributes to normal psychological function


Minerals and trace elements


	Trace elements are essential to life and are involved in important metabolic processes.
	Life Light® MultiAll contains a specially tuned mineral and trace element blend with potassium, manganese, zinc, selenium, chromium and molybdenum, as well as naturally bound calcium and magnesium in the optimum efficiency ratio 2: 1.
	The minerals phosphorus and sodium and the trace elements copper, iron and iodine were deliberately left out of the recipe so that Life Light® MultiAll can also be used by people with a controlled intake of these substances.


Vitaminoids- and enzyme complex


	As a special feature, Life Light ® MultiAll also contains alpha lipoic acid, L-carnitine, coenzyme Q10, and the plant enzymes bromelain and papain, and L-glutathione.
	Coenzyme Q10 (ubiquinone) is also an endogenous substance, that occurs in all cells.


Recommended Use


	Take 2 capsules with plenty of water. Take for at least 3 months, consult your doctor if you wish to take longer.


What is so special about Life Light® MultiAll?


	High-quality, hypoallergenic ingredients without additives
	1 capsule covers approximately 50% of the recommended average daily dose of the micronutrients contained (according to Directive 2008/100 / EC).
	2 capsules cover 100 percent of average daily needs. The specific dosage can be adapted with consultation from your doctor. 
	Free of allergens, lactose-, gluten- and artificial additives.


Meaningfully combined with: 
Life Light® Olive Leaf Elixir

productTitle: Source of Life - Energy Shake, 1.014 g
description:
Vitamin, Mineral & Protein Shake


	Source of Life stands for whole-food-based multivitamins and nutritional supplements. These combine effective dosages of individual vitamins, minerals and other nutrients with whole-food concentrates from original foods.
	Source of Life is a meal replacement with a muesli flavour, is rich in plant proteins. The comprehensive, balanced multivitamin with whole food concentrates including vitamins, minerals, lipids, bioflavonoids, enzymes, plant pigments, amino and nucleic acids, herbs, wholegrain rice, spirulina, bee pollen, barley grass, sunflower oil, carrots and black currant seeds.
	One serving contains about the same amount of vital substances as a daily dose consisting of 3 tablets original Source of Life.


Recommended use:

Life Light Prosta effect is a high-quality micronutrient complex with selenium and zinc for men.

Recommended use:
